mapper.sql: id, username, school_num, nickname, phone, email, photo_src, sex
mapper.select:
select u_id `name`, p.email as "email", p.major as "major.id", src, status, isNew, m.major as "major.major", s.school as "major.school.school" from tb_user u, tb_poor p, tb_major m, tb_school s where 1 and u.id=p.u_id and m.id=p.major and s.id=m.s_id and u.id=p.u_id
and u.id=#{uId}
mapper.update: update tb_user set nickname=#{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, photo_src=#{photo_src} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user( username, password, school_num, nickname, photo_src, sex, push ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{school_num}, #{nickname}, #{photo_src}, #{sex}, #{push} )
insert ignore into tb_poor( u_id, `name`, email, major, src, status ) values( #{u_id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{major.id}, #{src}, #{status} )
